comments.body:
```suggestion
```
I'd argue you no longer need this. It's not used during the CI already
and you're not referencing anything directly

Sorry, missed this comment, only saw the tick below.

When I ran `npm test create-cert` from the root of the directory, it failed with this error -- I had to add a minimum TypeScript version to get it to run at all, and then it raised some errors for me to fix. Does the CI run something else?
runs same, but maybe you're local TS repo was outdated. I've run PR locally, no problems
ah, shoot, I had a bad cached `node_modules`. I removed that and did an `npm install` again, and now it installed the right typescript versions to `.dts`. Sorry about that!
